basics.name: Caleb Streit
basics.label: Network & Cyber Support Specialist
basics.summary: Motivated information technology/security professional with hands-on experience in network security, system administration, and technical support across many technical environments. Skilled in managing and securing infrastructure, including firewalls, VPNs, cloud platforms, and Microsoft environments. Proven ability to lead security projects, deploy and maintain network devices, and support enterprise IT systems. Holds a B.S. in Cyber and Information Security Technology and multiple certifications including Security+, Network+, and A+.

work.name: JiLaSoan Technologies
work.summary: Administered Active Directory, Entra ID, Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, VOIP systems, and other cloud software for customers. Adjusted licensing, users, groups, and settings according to customer needs.
highlights: Administered Active Directory, Entra ID, Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, and VOIP systems for customers.
Adjusted licensing, users, groups, and settings according to customer needs.

work.name: Surveying Solutions, Bolton & Menk, Inc.
work.summary: Provided excellent customer service via phone and email to address customer requests regarding projects, schedules, and cost estimates. Redesigned the company website which increased SEO rankings and generated more leads.
highlights: Provided excellent customer service via phone and email.
Redesigned the company website which increased SEO rankings and generated more leads.

work.name: NetSmart, Inc
work.summary: Disassembled laptops and desktops to upgrade or replace CPUs, RAM, and HDD/SSD storage. Performed clean installs of operating systems on new equipment to minimize supply chain risks and remove bloatware. Created user accounts, configured group policy, adjusted BIOS settings, installed patches, and updated system drivers.
highlights: Disassembled laptops and desktops to upgrade or replace CPUs, RAM, and storage.
Performed clean installs of operating systems on new equipment.
Created user accounts, configured group policy, and adjusted BIOS settings.

volunteer.position: Logistics NCO, IT Officer, Color Guard Commander, and Flight Commander
volunteer.summary: Volunteered in the Civil Air Patrol cadet program, the auxiliary of the U.S. Air Force. Held staff positions including Logistics NCO, IT Officer, Color Guard Commander, and Flight Commander from 2016 to 2021.
highlights: Held multiple leadership positions within the Civil Air Patrol.

awards.title: CyberPatriot Competition
awards.summary: Our team placed 2nd in the NC Gold Tier All-Service division during the 2020-2021 competition.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Recognized for high academic performance throughout the duration of my bachelor's degree program at ECPI University.

publications.name: Credited for drone photography of the Calvin Jones House
publications.summary: Offered to take photos and videos of the Calvin Jones House with my drone. Afterwards, I edited and provided the results to the friendly staff at the Wake Forest Historical Museum. They used these images and videos for their website and social media pages.Offered to take photos and videos of the Calvin Jones House with my drone. publications.name: 2025 Cyber Sentinel Challenge
